title: Help & Rules
description: Find answers to frequently asked questions and learn about service rules
howToOrderDesc: Learn how to quickly order a ride
paymentAndRatesDesc: Information about payment methods and rates

routeSelection.title: Route Selection
routeSelection.description: How to properly select a trip route
routeSelection.content: Open the map and select departure and destination points. Specify the exact address for correct route calculation.

driverSelection.title: Driver Selection
driverSelection.description: How to choose a suitable driver
driverSelection.content: Browse available drivers, their ratings and reviews. Choose a suitable driver for your trip.

orderConfirmation.title: Order Confirmation
orderConfirmation.description: How to confirm a trip order
orderConfirmation.content: Confirm trip details: time, address, number of passengers. The driver will receive a notification about the order.

waitingDriver.title: Waiting for Driver
waitingDriver.description: What to do while waiting for the driver
waitingDriver.content: The driver will arrive at the specified address within 5-10 minutes. You can track their location on the map.

paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentMethods.content: Various payment methods are available: bank cards, electronic wallets, cash on delivery. Choose the method convenient for you.

tariffCalculation.title: Tariff Calculation
tariffCalculation.content: Tariff is calculated automatically based on distance, trip time and selected tariff plan. All prices are in manats.

tariffPlans.title: Tariff Plans
tariffPlans.content: Choose a suitable tariff plan: basic, premium or corporate. Each plan has its advantages and features.

refund.title: Refund
refund.content: In case of trip cancellation or technical problems, funds are returned to your account within 1-3 business days.

generalProvisions.title: General Provisions
generalProvisions.description: Learn about the basic principles of service operation
generalProvisions.content: Basic rules for using the FixDrive service. By using the service, you agree to these terms of use. The service provides a platform for ordering rides between drivers and passengers.

terms.title: Terms
terms.content: Service usage terms. To use the service, you need to create an account with valid data. You are responsible for the security of your account credentials.

policy.title: Policy
policy.content: Privacy and data processing policy. We collect and process your data in accordance with the law. Your privacy is important to us.

rules.title: Rules
rules.description: Additional rules for ordering and canceling trips
rules.content: Additional rules and restrictions. When ordering a trip, specify the exact destination address. Trip cancellation should be done in advance.

driverCheck.title: Driver Verification
driverCheck.content: All drivers undergo thorough verification of documents, vehicles and criminal background. We guarantee the safety of every trip.

routeTracking.title: Route Tracking
routeTracking.content: Your loved ones can track your route in real time. Share the trip link for additional safety.

emergencyButton.title: Emergency Button
emergencyButton.description: How to use the emergency button
emergencyButton.content: An emergency button is available in the app for quick help. When pressed, a signal is automatically sent to the security service.

ratingSystem.title: Rating System
ratingSystem.content: After each trip, you can rate the driver. This helps maintain high service quality and safety.
